message.body: mycar was totally stripped. i gave the lot my title and they will crush it. :(
Oh no! I'm so sorry. How are you feeling?
glad to have closure, i guesss.
Yeah, at least you know. Such a bummer tho. How is driving manual?
i need more practice... what are you up to today?
just posted photos to fb
Sitting at my moms. We got new phones yesterday and then my mom had a nervous breakdown. I spent the morning trying to help her find a therapist. Now she's napping. Im feeling fragile
i'm sorry. i didn't know your mom was so unstable. do you want to talk on the phone?
No, I don't want her to hear me. We had to take her phone back this morning because she was sick and unable to sleep last night. I felt really bad for the woman at att
i'm sorry. when will you be back? is ellaa with you?
Yes. I'm coming back Monday. Ella was going to stay here since I start school Tuesday, but I don't want to stress out my mom. I guess I will see how it goes
how's it going? i'm with coconut at this cool drum show in the park at 40th and walnut. wish you were here
Fun, I'm making an early departure from lanc..this trip was traumatic. Leaving now
probably for the best. when will you be home?
Just stopped for gas and a bag of chez mix to stress eat on the way home. Getting on turnpike now, maybe ninety mins
:) me and coconut might be in the neighborhood...
omg.me and coconut and nate are drinking together at fume. so random.
Whoa weird I just got off at spring garden
Are you going to b there? Should I come or no?
i will probably only be there for 30 minutes more or so. coconut is starting to get to me... are you close?
Like a block away..I don't want to drop in on Nate
i think we will leave. nate is wasted, fyi. i can't tell but he told me so
Ok Have a good night
Did u get home ok?
yes. thanks. going to new york for a few days with pete. feeling nervous about what he'll be capable of.
When are you going? Are you staying with friends? New York is so stimulating
i'm here now. be back tues. staying at my friend's place while she and her bf are in iceland.
How is new York?
ok. i am stresssed out though. thrying to figure out where to take pete, where to eat, monitoring him for exhaustion, etc... he can't make any decisions.
Oh no, I'm sorry. You need a break and this doesn't seem to be it. I will be at the beach tomorrow, but Wednesday I'm free after school
i am making it worse than it is. it's just hard bd he constantly flucuates
Just enjoy yourselves..is the weather nice?
it's raining...how are you? how's your mom?
I'm ok , feeling really down for some non specified reason..I haven't checked on my mono
Mo
Mom
back in philly. how are you today?
i told pete i'm not going to be able to take this much longer.
Sorry t the beach w Nate..what did Pete say?
Would u like us to visit?
sure!
it's slow here
R u at work or home
at work
Quit, come over and have some wine
How are you doing? awkward lunch at bryn mawr
why awkward? how was the beach?
Because its bryn mawr...the beach was marvelous, I'm so sunburned tho
Cory cancelled plans with me at the time we were supposed to meet, and now she isn't responding to me..I guess I'm officially shit list ?
cory will never change. making plans with her means accepting her terms.
And assuming that you are somehow the one that caused her to be angry.
well it couldn't be her fault...
Right. How are things with pete?
the same. he is fine in the house. low stakes.
Any more thought about your talk?
to answer ur question, i am just getting tired of deciding everything for pete...., not being able to go out to most places, always monitoring him for s
ymptoms, etc... just getting really tired. we rarely can have a fun time. it's all about him.
he gets up bf i do and goes to sleep before me...cuddling is awkward bc i want it to me more but don't want to get my feelings hurt by trying to initiat
e only to be rejected...
